item.title: Brexit and Disability?
item.author: Hishi Aty,Sam Haselgrove,
item.description: As you are probably aware, ever since the invocation of Article 50 on 29th March 2017, the entire country has been on-edge. Whether you are a ‘brexiteer’ or a ‘remainer’, everyone’s fear of the unknown and split opinions have made the process of leaving ever more… complicated, to say the least. How …

item.title: Meet the Disabilities Officer!
item.author: Sam Haselgrove,
item.description: Hey guys! My name is Sam, and I am the Disabilities Officer for the Student Union here at Imperial. My role is to represent the interests of and improve the university experience for the disabled community. There are a few ways of defining a disability; the way that I define it is through the social …
